title: The One About Bob's Voice
description:
On this week's episode of Sibling Rivalry, Bob opens up about his experience recovering from surgery this past month, Monét is accused of gaslighting and gatekeeping, we find out about Bob and Monét's Thanksgivings, and Bob reveals his Spotify Wrapped.
Find out for yourself why GLAMNETIC lashes are Instagram’s favorite beauty hack.  Go to glamnetic.com/RIVALRY and enter our promo code RIVALRY for 30% off your order. 
This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Sibling Rivalry listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/RIVALRY
Go to BOMBAS.com/RIVALRY, and get twenty percent off your first purchase.
Follow “Harsh Reality: The Story of Miriam Rivera” on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or you can listen early and ad free by joining Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondery App. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
